revision.text:
{{Infobox Mega Stone |name = Lucarionite |image = [[File:Lucarionite.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of ''Lucarionite'' |location = Reward from beating [[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Korrina]] in [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Shalour City]]. }} ==Description== '''Lucarionite''' is a [[Mega Evolution#Mega Pokémon|Mega Stone]] that is used in combination with a Key Stone to [[Mega Evolution|Mega Evolve]] Lucario into Mega Lucario. ==Requirements== In order to Mega Evolve Lucario into Mega Lucario, 14,500 attack must first be attained on Lucario through breeding. Once Lucario has 14,500 or more attack, using a [[Key Stone]] on it will cause it to Mega Evolve into Mega Lucario. {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Pokémon !! Mega Evolution !! Attack Required !! Mega Stone |- | {{Pokemon|Lucario}} || {{Pokemon|Mega Lucario}} || style="text-align:center" | 14,500+ || style="text-align:center" | [[File:Lucarionite.png|50px]] |- |} ==Acquisition== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Trainer !! Location !! Requirement !! Reward |- | [[File:Korrina.png|30px]][[Temporary Battles#Kalos|Korrina]] || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Shalour City]] || [[Gyms#Kalos|Rumble Badge]] || {{Pokemon|Lucarionite}} |- |}
{{Mega Stones}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Mega Stones]]
